TopicTitle: Stock fire and forget missiles in 1.7.1

Articles.Content: So I was experimenting with stock AAM's, but when I was testing the "lock on" for them, drone cores can't do the "target" SAS function unless there is a kerbal controlling the craft. Anyone have any ideas how to make a different lock system? (Or if im just doing something wrong)
Different probe cores have different capabilities. If you right click on them in the part picker, you can see which SAS modes they have installed.

4 hours ago, Turtles4Life said:

So I was experimenting with stock AAM's, but when I was testing the "lock on" for them, drone cores can't do the "target" SAS function unless there is a kerbal controlling the craft. Anyone have any ideas how to make a different lock system? (Or if im just doing something wrong)

Use a "CH-J3 Fly-By-Wire Avionics Hub" - it will add full SAS to any probe core used, including the 'Target' mode. It's under the Command and Control part group (together with the reaction wheels and RCS thrusters) and looks and works very much like a small nose cone.
